title: Swachh Bharat Drive
description: Students participated in a cleanliness drive to promote hygiene and community well-being.

title: Blood Donation Camp
description: A successful blood donation drive organized by students and faculty, saving many lives.

title: Tree Plantation Initiative
description: Hundreds of saplings were planted as part of an effort to promote a greener environment.

title: Rural Outreach Program
description: Students visited rural areas to teach and provide educational materials to underprivileged children.

title: Community Health Checkup
description: Medical checkups were conducted for local communities to ensure better health awareness.

title: Education Drive for Underprivileged
description: A special initiative to provide basic education and learning resources to children in need.
